name: Class BasicTreeUI.NodeDimensionsHandler
text:
Class responsible for getting size of node, method is forwarded
 to BasicTreeUI method. X location does not include insets, that is
 handled in getPathBounds.

methods.method_sig:
public Rectangle getNodeDimensions (Object value,
                                   int row,
                                   int depth,
                                   boolean expanded,
                                   Rectangle size)
methods.description: Responsible for getting the size of a particular node.

methods.method_sig:
protected int getRowX (int row,
                      int depth)
methods.description: Returns amount to indent the given row.
